name: Pablo & Jack
description:
Programming by mpaul0416, art by Robsart, combined effort in sounds and overal design

Pablo &  Jack
An arctic adventure

Oh-oh! 

Pablo the penguin and Jack the polar bear  have run  out of food! 

Help the two unlikely friends traverse through the icy colds  to restock their supply of fish,    keep dangerous foul foes at bay with  the power of snowballs and show the world that  anyone can survive through the power of teamwork!

Take control of either Pablo or Jack - until you get hit!   Be   wary   of   incoming predators and no-good-doers;   taking damage switches around the character you're controlling!  Communication is key - both for Pablo and Jack and for you!

Goal of the game:

Find all the crates of fish scattered around  the level and return them to your campsite one by one!

Controls:
Note: controls swap between characters when you get hit, but your input buttons remain the same!

2-players (recommended):

By using the same controller -or one set of a keyboard and a mouse-    simultaneously,  control one of the two  best friends each. 

1-player:

Although intended for two players, Pablo &   Jack can be played as a single player game as well!  The player controls both characters at the same time. 

Gamepad (recommended):
Left/right stick:  Rotate Pablo / move Jack in given direction
LT/RT:  Throw snowball as Pablo

Keyboard:

WASD/Mouse:   Rotate Pablo    /    move Jack in given direction
Spacebar/Left mouse click:   Throw snowball as Pablo

Credits:

Music:
Loneliness Minimal Loop,  acquired at https://johnleonardfrench.com/ultimate-game-music-collection/

Sounds: 
Various sounds  acquired   from    https://www.zapsplat.com  and edited with Audacity

Fonts:
Sunrise   International
Comic Sans Bold
Source:  https://www.dafont.com 

List of superlatives from   https://qr.ae/pNK8Yx
